COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf2
STRING: I woke up slightly before noon, and as I was slowly
getting ready, Phorni suddenly said something weird.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey, can I go, too?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x142
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? To Torta's?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x160
STRING: [Phorni] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x176
STRING: Phorni had said she wanted to go to Torta's house
before, and I had sometimes brought her so she
wouldn't be found.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c
STRING: I thought she was satisfied with that one time, as she
hadn't asked again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a2
STRING: And one time after that, when I had a cold, she came
with me because she said she was worried.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b8
STRING: Phorni was the type that didn't want to go outside
much, which was nice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ce
STRING: So when she asked on rare occasions like this, it was
hard to refuse.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e4
STRING: [Chris] “But... Why all of a sudden?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x216
STRING: [Phorni] “I just wanted to go. Is that wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22c
STRING: [Chris] “It's not that, but I don't think we'll do anything
but practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25e
STRING: [Phorni] “That's fine, of course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x274
STRING: [Chris] “Well, okay, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a6
STRING: [Phorni] “Thanks. I'm already ready.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bc
STRING: [Chris] “I know. I'll be ready soon, then we can leave.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f6
STRING: [Chris] “But why did you say that so suddenly?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x316
STRING: As Phorni rode on my shoulder, I spoke to her in a small
voice so no one would notice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x348
STRING: [Phorni] “I said I just kind of wanted to go, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35e
STRING: [Chris] “I don't think it's just that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x374
STRING: Phorni shook her head as if it was nothing, letting my
words pass over her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38a
STRING: It seemed she didn't want to answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x396
STRING: [Chris] “Well, whatever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ba
STRING: She almost never asked to go outside, so I assumed she
didn't really like being outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d0
STRING: She said she wanted to come anyway, so there must
have been a good reason.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e6
STRING: I was thinking of these things as we walked, when
Phorni whispered to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x418
STRING: [Phorni] “I thought this might be the last time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x42e
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm...? You mean what we were talking about
before? I think I'll be going to Torta's house a lot from
now on.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x456
STRING: [Phorni] “That's probably true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x46c
STRING: [Chris] “Is this about Ninna by any chance?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x48a
STRING: [Phorni] “That, too... Maybe?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a0
STRING: [Chris] “You really like that entire family, don't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ca
STRING: I summed up my psychoanalysis of Phorni with a joke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ee
STRING: I wondered why she would want to see Ninna again,
whom she'd hardly ever met.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x504
STRING: She was blind and her legs weren't so good... That was
the best reason I could think of, but Phorni couldn't
even talk to her, and Ninna couldn't hear her sing,
either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x524
STRING: But... If she still wanted to see her, there was no harm
in bringing her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x53a
STRING: I didn't think any more answers were forthcoming, so I
headed to her house in silence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x584
STRING: [Torta] “Just a minute.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5aa
STRING: I heard a voice, then the door immediately opened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d2
STRING: [Torta] “Sorry to keep you waiting. You're a little early
today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5e8
STRING: [Chris] “I guess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5fe
STRING: I couldn't very well say that Phorni had rushed me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x62c
STRING: [Ninna] “I'm glad to see you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x656
STRING: [Chris] “Hello. Thank you for having me again today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x688
STRING: [Phorni] “My-my, aren't we speaking politely today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x69e
STRING: I could do nothing but ignore Phorni at times like these.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c0
STRING: [Ninna] “Long time no see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d6
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? Oh, it has been two weeks, but it's been
hard...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6fe
STRING: [Ninna] “It's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x714
STRING: Ninna spoke over me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x728
STRING: [Ninna] “So will you let me hear your practice again
today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x73e
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Yes. Our performance is still poor, and we
only practice the one song, so I'm sure it won't be very
interesting.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x784
STRING: [Torta] “Hey, Chris! I'm singing with you, so stop talking
so humbly. And why do you always speak so formally
when you first get here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d8
STRING: [Phorni] “Seriously...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7f6
STRING: [Ninna] “Hee-hee...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x81a
STRING: I was already used to this oft-repeated conversation, so
I ignored it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x830
STRING: The fact that I kept doing it nonetheless was probably
my fault for not being able to use polite language the
whole time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x846
STRING: [Chris] “Well, let's get to it. We have to practice a lot
today to make up for tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x882
STRING: [Torta] “An admirable idea. That means I have to get
inspired, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a4
STRING: Torta started getting ready almost before she was
finished talking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b0
STRING: I casually moved Phorni from my shoulder to the table,
and got the music stand and the Fortelle ready.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8c6
STRING: I glanced at Phorni as I moved; she was sitting on the
edge of the table, swinging her legs.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8dc
STRING: She said she wanted to see Ninna, but she wasn't
looking at Ninna at all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f2
STRING: Maybe she was feeling lonely because I was practicing
with Torta so much?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x924
STRING: [Torta] “I'm ready.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x93a
STRING: [Chris] “Mm-hmm, I'll be done in a second.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x95c
STRING: I touched the keys lightly, and struck a few chords to
get my fingers used to it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x972
STRING: [Chris] “Do you need to warm up your voice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a4
STRING: [Torta] “I sang a couple times this morning, so I'm okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ba
STRING: [Chris] “Okay. So, let's begin.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e4
STRING: At almost the same time I placed my fingers on the
keys, Torta looked at me and poised herself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa1c
STRING: At the moment the first note of her song rang out, I had
already forgotten myself, and had become one of the
many intermingled notes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa3c
STRING: Even my heart to feel that was light now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa4a
STRING: At the same time, it felt like I was hearing it from far
away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa62
STRING: I was able to look around, and even though I wasn't
moving my head, I felt like I could see everything
around me clearly with my own eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa82
STRING: The sound bouncing off the walls seemed like noise to
me, and I put even more power in to my Fortelle
playing to drown it out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa98
STRING: Torta's voice also had plenty of strength to assist me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaae
STRING: Her pianissimo voice sounded like a whisper in my ear,
and the Fortelle's voice sounded like a shout.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad2
STRING: The sound vibrations just felt good.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf2
STRING: Silence descended on the room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xafe
STRING: Even breathing seemed a nuisance in that silence, and
what finally broke it was...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb1c
STRING: Ninna's applause.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb44
STRING: [Ninna] “You've gotten even better. So much better than
before.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb92
STRING: [Torta] “Thanks...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xba8
STRING: Torta answered slightly exhausted, perhaps from a
certain sense of accomplishment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbbe
STRING: I felt the same, and felt more tired than from practicing
for an hour.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbd4
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you very much. But, we can't be satisfied
yet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbfc
STRING: [Ninna] “That's to be expected. But wasn't that the best
performance you could give, under the current
circumstances?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc38
STRING: [Torta] “Maybe. But you can't praise Chris too much. He
slacks off from practice as soon as he does well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc58
STRING: [Chris] “Ummm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc6e
STRING: I searched for a retort, but couldn't find the right words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc84
STRING: Giving up on wondering what to say, I moved my gaze
to Phorni, who must not have felt like saying anything,
as she just looked at me silently.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc6
STRING: I realized that she didn't sing like when Torta and I
practiced at my apartment, and instead just listened
quietly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce6
STRING: I couldn't praise her for it, so I just sent a smile Phorni's
way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd10
STRING: Phorni returned the smile, so I think she understood
what I wanted to say.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd48
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway. Last time was the same, but do you
mind if we practice normally?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd70
STRING: [Ninna] “Of course not. I'll do the cooking again today,
so I'll excuse myself now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd90
STRING: [Chris] “Isn't is a bit early yet? I just got here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdae
STRING: [Ninna] “I'm making something a little different today. It
will take a lot of time and effort.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdce
STRING: [Chris] “I see. I'm looking forward to it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdec
STRING: [Torta] “And you'll be in the kitchen, right? We'll
practice here, so I'm sure you'll hear.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe14
STRING: [Ninna] “Yeah. I heard you well last time, I'm not worried
about that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe42
STRING: Saying this, Ninna went into the kitchen with the same
sure steps as before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe58
STRING: [Chris] “I thought so last time, too, but I'm glad Ninna
seems healthy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe94
STRING: [Torta] “Her legs seem to have good days and bad days.
It's mostly good when you visit, Chris. So it would be
nice if you came by a little more often.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xebe
STRING: [Chris] “As much as I can...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef0
STRING: [Torta] “Thanks. Okay, let's continue our practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf06
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah-yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf28
STRING: In that vein, we continued practicing like always.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf34
STRING: Phorni must have gotten bored part of the way through,
as she started singing with us, and since I could hear
her, I couldn't really throw myself into practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf54
STRING: I really enjoyed myself, though it wasn't a substitute for
serious practice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf6a
STRING: I was having so much fun that Torta was suspicious of
me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf80
STRING: I said I'd practice more seriously, but I had also gotten
used to that at some point, and before I knew it, I was
having more fun at practice than ever.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc8
STRING: Then, at a time that would be a little early to stop
practice, Ninna came out of the kitchen and waited until
we stopped playing before speaking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1004
STRING: [Ninna] “Sorry to interrupt your practice...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x101a
STRING: She continued as though it was hard for her to say.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1042
STRING: [Ninna] “I don't quite have enough ingredients; can you
go shopping for me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x107e
STRING: [Torta] “I went shopping the day before yesterday.
Wasn't that enough?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a6
STRING: [Ninna] “Not quite... And I'd like if you'd both go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ce
STRING: [Torta] “Both of us? If you really need it, I can go by
myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ec
STRING: [Ninna] “Maybe, but today is the day before Natale,
right? This isn't such an unsafe city, but it's already dark
outside.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x112a
STRING: It was just as Ninna said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1136
STRING: Perhaps it stemmed from the responsibility and pride of
being a cultural hub, but the city was mostly peaceful,
and there wasn't much crime.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1156
STRING: Even so, the young people of this country, whose nature
was to enjoy the festive atmosphere, would sometimes
be boisterous at this time of year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x116c
STRING: Although there were almost no instances of them
intentionally harming people.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1182
STRING: But... You couldn't say for sure that it would never
happen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x118e
STRING: [Chris] “It's okay, I'll go with you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c0
STRING: [Torta] “Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11de
STRING: [Ninna] “Thanks. I must thank you for this later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11f4
STRING: [Chris] “Your delicious cooking will be plenty.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x120a
STRING: Ninna laughed softly at my flattery.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1232
STRING: [Torta] “So what should we buy?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1250
STRING: [Ninna] “Everything written here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1266
STRING: Saying this, Ninna passed a small piece of paper to
Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x128e
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm? Didn't I buy this yesterday?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ac
STRING: [Ninna] “I just burnt it. It's embarrassing so I was trying
not to say anything.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d4
STRING: [Torta] “That's rare...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f2
STRING: [Ninna] “These things happen. Now if you don't go
soon, I won't be able to make dinner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x132e
STRING: [Torta] “Yes, ma'am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1344
STRING: [Chris] “Understood.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x135c
STRING: Smiling a little at the idea that even Ninna could fail at
cooking, I left with Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1390
STRING: I wondered what to do with Phorni, and was I looking at
her standing on the table when she noticed and shook
her head.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13a6
STRING: I'd be back anyway, and it wouldn't be that long.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13b2
STRING: [Chris] “Alright, see you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13d6
STRING: Leaving the nodding Phorni behind, I walked outside
with Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13f2
STRING: [Chris] “So what are we buying?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1424
STRING: [Torta] “Fish. It's today's main course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x143a
STRING: [Chris] “Something so important...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1450
STRING: It was tradition to make fish on the eve of Natale.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x145c
STRING: And to have meat on Natale itself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x148e
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, it really is rare, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a4
STRING: [Chris] “I'll bet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ba
STRING: Torta tilted her head as if in thought, then quickly
smiled and spoke as if she'd forgotten what she just
said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ec
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, let's get going.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1502
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah-yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1542
STRING: The city was definitely more lively than usual.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x154e
STRING: In a little while the people outside would go home to
spend time with their families, and it would probably
get very quiet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1564
STRING: However, it was still packed with people on their way
home from last-minute Natale shopping.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x157a
STRING: I slid between them with Torta, quickly finishing our
business.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15a4
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, I'll leave the rest to you, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15c8
STRING: Saying this, we stopped in front of the store, and I
gazed out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15d4
STRING: Torta's said something like “got it,” and it passed
through my ears as I watched the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ea
STRING: Thanks to the roof that covered the sidewalk, you could
walk without worrying about getting wet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1600
STRING: Because Torta's house was relatively close to the main
road, I hardly got wet at all on the way to the store.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1616
STRING: As I watched people pass by, I felt a strange discomfort,
wondering why I was there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x162c
STRING: Both times I had spent Natale with Arietta in this city
had been from the morning of the 25th.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1642
STRING: Arie would take the overnight train the night before and
I'd meet her at the station in the morning.
We'd go straight to the cathedral for Mass,
and then back to my apartment until late at night.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1662
STRING: The first year, Arie said she wanted to eat the first meal
I learned how to make, and I remember making pasta
that night.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1678
STRING: Because Arie wrote about that in her letter, I got made
fun of the other day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x168e
STRING: Even the things I forgot remained in Torta's memory as
something to laugh at.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a4
STRING: I was pretty sure that we ate out the second year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b0
STRING: I didn't remember the reason, but that's how it went.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c6
STRING: Now it was another year later, and she wasn't here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16d2
STRING: She wouldn't be there the next morning, either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16de
STRING: Though I probably wouldn't feel lonely.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ea
STRING: Because I was going to spend the next day with Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16f6
STRING: It would be after Natale when I wrote that in a letter
and sent it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x170c
STRING: And it would be another week for Arie's reply after
reading my letter to reach me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1722
STRING: What would Arie think?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x172e
STRING: Would she laugh it off as obvious because she's my
partner?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1744
STRING: Or...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x176c
STRING: [Torta] “Sorry to keep you waiting.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1782
STRING: [Chris] “Welcome back...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17b4
STRING: [Torta] “It's weird to say welcome back, but...
Whatever. Anyway, I don't want dinner to be late, so
let's go back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17d4
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17ea
STRING: I answered this to the girl I'd be spending the next day
with as well, and took her shopping bag as we walked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1824
STRING: When we got back to the house, Ninna and Phorni
standing on the table both welcomed us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x183a
STRING: Ninna must have been tired, as she was waiting for us in
her chair.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x186c
STRING: [Torta] “I'm back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1882
STRING: [Chris] “We're back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ac
STRING: Torta scowled at me for correcting her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c2
STRING: Then she continued as if nothing happened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ea
STRING: [Torta] “Right... We bought the fish.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x191c
STRING: [Ninna] “Thank you. All I have to do is cook it well in
some olive oil; it'll be ready soon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1944
STRING: [Torta] “Shall I help?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1962
STRING: [Ninna] “I can do that much by myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1986
STRING: Ninna went back into the kitchen, smiling.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19a4
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm? Oh, it's fine. She won't listen to anyone
when she's like that. She's been alive for so long, she's
much better than I am at cooking, even if she can't
see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19ce
STRING: [Chris] “Better than you? Doesn't mean much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a00
STRING: [Torta] “Ho-ho... You went there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a16
STRING: [Chris] “I'm kidding. You're practicing, right? Whenever
you think you're good enough, Torta, I want to try your
cooking.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a52
STRING: [Torta] “I don't like hearing that, but I guess it can't be
helped.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a68
STRING: Seeming to remember her past, Torta said this as if it
really couldn't be helped.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a7e
STRING: [Chris] “So what should we do about practice from now
on?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ab0
STRING: [Torta] “Well, I think that's enough for today. We can't
practice much tomorrow, but I think it's okay to spend
Natale quietly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ada
STRING: [Chris] “Even though you were saying we needed to
practice so much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1af8
STRING: [Torta] “It's a problem of motivation. Also, it's probably
better to practice a little bit every day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b18
STRING: [Chris] “I guess that's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b50
STRING: I turned my gaze to Phorni, who was staring into the
distance as if deep in thought.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b66
STRING: I couldn't talk to her right away, so I made a mental
note of it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b8a
STRING: Just after that, I heard Ninna's voice from the kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b9e
STRING: [Ninna] “Torta, it's ready; come and get it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bd0
STRING: [Torta] “Coming.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1be6
STRING: [Chris] “Shall I help, too?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c18
STRING: [Torta] “Grandma would never let a guest do that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c46
STRING: I was the one who was using the formal language.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c52
STRING: So they were supposed to treat me as a guest.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c5e
STRING: I watched Torta hurry into the kitchen, then spoke to
Phorni, who was sitting in front of the Fortelle, looking
bored.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c7c
STRING: [Chris] “You look bored.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c92
STRING: It would have been bad if someone heard me, so I
lightly played the song we were practicing with one
hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cc4
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm...? Oh, not really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cda
STRING: It took Phorni a while to notice me, then she answered.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cf0
STRING: [Chris] “It's probably okay while we were practicing, but
we're just going to eat now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d18
STRING: [Phorni] “Listening to you and Torta talk keeps me from
getting bored.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d38
STRING: [Chris] “But you looked really bored before.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d6a
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, I was just thinking a little about things. I
noticed you looking at me, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d8a
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dbe
STRING: I sensed Torta walking out of the kitchen behind me
with the food, and stopped talking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ddc
STRING: [Torta] “Here you are. It's hot, so be careful.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1df2
STRING: Saying this, she set a plate of something on the table
right behind me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e08
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Yeah, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e1e
STRING: I couldn't stand quitting a song part-way through, and
instead I replied without turning around.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e48
STRING: Torta didn't notice, and hummed as she returned to the
kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e5e
STRING: Then she brought more and more food from the
kitchen.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e6a
STRING: It was very suitable for Natale, but it was a little much
for only three of us to eat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e98
STRING: With the food in front of us, a slightly solemn
atmosphere prevailed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ea4
STRING: Ninna offered a simple prayer, and the flames of the
candles wavered.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ec2
STRING: [Ninna] “Now then. Enough with the formality. Eat as
much as you like.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eea
STRING: [Torta] “Yes, ma'am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f00
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, ma'am.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f16
STRING: Phorni sat on the edge of the table as always, listening
to our conversation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f2c
STRING: Sometimes she looked out at nothing, as if she was
bored.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f38
STRING: As for me, I felt like I was gazing at this painting of a
Natale scene from far away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f58
STRING: I felt like I was no longer myself, just like when I was
playing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f6e
STRING: At times like those, I was either throwing myself into a
performance, or chatting with someone while wearing a
smile as if nothing had happened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f8e
STRING: It was times like these that I felt the most natural, and
I'm sure that other people saw that as well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fbe
STRING: [Torta] “...Then you know what Chris said?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fda
STRING: [Chris] “What was it again...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ff6
STRING: Ninna's laugh made the flames waver again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2002
STRING: That's when I thought that this was the proper way to
spend Natale.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2018
STRING: Unlike the nobility with their mansions in the city, most
of the students who lived alone here went home for the
holidays.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2038
STRING: There were quite a few third year students who
remained to practice, but they were still in the minority.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x204e
STRING: Then there was me, who hadn't returned home once in
three years.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2064
STRING: My parents had told me it wasn't especially necessary
for me to return.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2070
STRING: Torta hadn't returned home, either, so perhaps it was a
family tradition for both of us, or we just came from an
area of easy-going people.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2086
STRING: I thought of these things while I continued to eat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2092
STRING: The smile didn't leave my face and the conversation
flowed naturally from my mouth, but despite that, I felt
like I wasn't really there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ec
STRING: [Ninna] “Now, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2102
STRING: We finished cleaning up from dinner, and continued
talking, Torta and I with our after-dinner espressos and
Ninna with her chamomile tea.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2122
STRING: The strange feeling from before had disappeared, and
things were just the same as always.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2140
STRING: [Ninna] “Now, I have a special present for the two of
you today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x217c
STRING: [Torta] “A present?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2192
STRING: [Chris] “Could that be what you were talking about
before? You didn't have to...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21ce
STRING: [Ninna] “Well, perhaps more than anything, it's
something I don't want to go to waste. I can't go to this,
so I was hoping that you would.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21ee
STRING: While I still had no idea what she meant, Ninna took a
small envelope out of her pocket.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2220
STRING: [Ninna] “Did you know there's a performance at the
Concert Hall tomorrow? I have two tickets for it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x225c
STRING: [Torta] “What? But that's the performance that you look
forward to every year, Grandma...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2284
STRING: [Ninna] “I can go next year and the year after that. You
two have never been, have you? This year is your last
here, so it's perfect.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22c2
STRING: [Chris] “But we have to practice...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22e0
STRING: [Ninna] “Listening to good music is a form of practice.
Didn't you learn that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22f6
STRING: [Chris] “We did learn that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2314
STRING: [Ninna] “It's a group made up of the school's alumni, so
listening to them before your graduation recital could
never be a bad thing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x235a
STRING: [Torta] “But two tickets...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2378
STRING: [Ninna] “I was thinking of going with you, Torta. But
now you have a splendid partner, so go with him.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23b6
STRING: [Chris] “Umm... I shouldn't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23d4
STRING: [Ninna] “Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23ea
STRING: They weren't strong words at all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23f6
STRING: But strangely, Ninna's words stopped me in my tracks.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2414
STRING: [Ninna] “You will go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2446
STRING: [Torta] “Chris... It's no use. You know how stubborn
Grandma is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2466
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah... Thank you very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2484
STRING: [Ninna] “Yes, you're welcome. The concert starts at
three o' clock, so if you're going to Mass, go early.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24ac
STRING: [Torta] “So, can you come early in the morning?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24c2
STRING: [Chris] “I suppose I could, what time?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24f4
STRING: [Torta] “Say around nine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x250a
STRING: [Chris] “That's early...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x253c
STRING: [Torta] “Even though you're always up that early with
Arie. Is there something wrong with me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x255c
STRING: [Chris] “No...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x258e
STRING: [Torta] “So you can wake up, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25a4
STRING: [Chris] “＊sigh＊ I was thinking I could sleep in this year.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25cc
STRING: [Ninna] “Oh, and you don't have to dress formally, but
you should come in your uniform.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2608
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, that's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x261e
STRING: [Chris] “Understood. Well, I should head home soon.
Looks like I have an early morning tomorrow...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x265a
STRING: [Torta] “Ah-ha-ha! I guess you do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2678
STRING: [Ninna] “Alright. See you tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2690
STRING: Phorni walked near my hand, as if she had been waiting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26a6
STRING: I casually picked her up and put her on my shoulder.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26b2
STRING: [Chris] “Where should we meet?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26e4
STRING: [Phorni] “Why don't you come pick her up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2716
STRING: [Ninna] “Why don't you come pick her up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x272c
STRING: [Chris] “Alright... I'll be here at nine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2742
STRING: Just as Phorni suddenly said this in my ear, Ninna said
the same thing, so that was the only way I could only
answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x278c
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, will you really come?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27a2
STRING: [Chris] “There's no other choice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27d4
STRING: [Torta] “That's not very nice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27ea
STRING: [Chris] “I'm kidding... I was thinking I'd pick you up
anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x281c
STRING: [Phorni] “Liar.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x284e
STRING: [Torta] “Liar.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x288e
STRING: [Ninna] “Hee-hee.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28a4
STRING: [Chris] “It doesn't matter. So, here tomorrow at nine?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28e4
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah-yeah. You can't come in casual clothes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28fc
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah-yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2912
STRING: I lightly said my farewells and stepped out into the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2948
STRING: [Chris] “Were you really not bored?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x297a
STRING: [Phorni] “I said I was fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2990
STRING: [Chris] “That's alright, then. So what will you do
tomorrow?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29c2
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, about that, can I ask you for a favor?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29d8
STRING: [Chris] “You want me to bring you along, right? I can't
talk to you, but I don't mind.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a14
STRING: [Phorni] “No, you can just take me to Torta's house.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a34
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? You want me to leave you at Torta's
house?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a52
STRING: [Phorni] “That's right. I don't like staying home alone,
but I don't want to impose on you two.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a72
STRING: [Chris] “You wouldn't be imposing. I'm just going to
church then to the concert with Torta. Are you just not
interested in other people's performances?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ab8
STRING: [Phorni] “That's not it. I just don't want to go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ace
STRING: [Chris] “This isn't you showing some kind of weird
courtesy, is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b0a
STRING: [Phorni] “No, I just don't want to go, but I also don't
want to be alone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b2a
STRING: [Chris] “I'll ask again, will you really not come with us? I
said I didn't mind, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b66
STRING: [Phorni] “I said I'm fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b7c
STRING: [Chris] “You're weird...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bae
STRING: [Phorni] “So make sure to come get me at night.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bc4
STRING: [Chris] “Well, I have to bring Torta home, so I'll get you
then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bf6
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c0c
STRING: I was waiting for her to retort, but for some reason
Phorni just smiled and answered like that.
